import React , {Fragment , useState} from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [diplaysocial , setDisplaySocial] = useState(false) const [formData , setFormData] = useState({ website: '', company: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', bio: '', githubusername: '', twitter: '', instgram: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '' }); const { website, company, location, status, skills, bio, githubusername, twitter, instgram, facebook, linkedin, youtube } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData , [e.target.name] : e.target.value}); return (

Create Your Profile

Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
{/* display social */}
Optional
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />

); } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default CreateProfile
